channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Video Background
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Video Background

item.title: CVE-2022-4652|2024-08-03T01:48:39.560Z -- unknown -- video%20background
item.description: The Video Background WordPress plugin before 2.7.5 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
